amendment.description: Amendment printed in House Report 109-19 and numbered 1 sought to provide for increases of $15.8 billion in fiscal year 2006 new budget authority and outlays for veterans, education, health care needs, homeland security, the environment and infrastructure; and reduce the fiscal year 2006 tax benefit for those earning more than $1 million.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered two printed in House Report 109-19 to increase $15.8 billion in FY06 new BA and outlays for veterans, education, health care needs, homeland security, the environment and infrastructure. Reduces the FY06 tax benefits for those earning more than $1 million, increasing revenues by $25.818 billion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 242 (Roll no. 82).
